mapper.select: SELECT UI_NUM, UI_NAME, UI_ID, UI_PWD FROM user_info WHERE UI_NUM=#{uiNum};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO(UI_NAME, UI_ID, UI_PWD) VALUES(#{uiName}, #{uiId}, #{uiPwd});
mapper.update: UPDATE user_info SET ui_name = #{uiName}, ui_id=#{uiId}, ui_pwd=#{uiPwd} WHERE UI_NUM=#{uiNum};
